channel.title: Spark-Connect on Sem Sinchenko
channel.description: Recent content in Spark-Connect on Sem Sinchenko

item.title: Extending Spark Connect
item.description: This blog post presents a very detailed step-by-step guide on how to create a SparkConnect protocol extension in Java and call it from PySpark. It will also cover a topic about how to define all the necessary proto3 messages for it. At the end of this guide you will have a way to interact with Spark JVM from PySpark almost like you can with py4j in a non-connect version.
